What we offer

DFTRADING is a community, where we come together to learn the basics of trading forex market just like a undergraduate to attaining PhD degree. This community is not a get rich platform but a well thought idea to start a trading journey with dedicated individuals. If we can spend a span of 4 years to 5 years in school for a degree and the end of those years we end up relying on the government to decide our faith and means of surviving, then its a waste of time spending those years. This community provides you the skill you need to harness and sharpen with the right mindset and dedication for you to attain success in trading. Trading forex is gambling when you don't have the right trading plan, strategy, mindset, and psychology. All well said , so what do we offer. What we offer. This community is completely free, no premium package or selling course outlines. You get the following offers if you join us today:

  • ♧ Basics of Forex
  • ♧ Candlestick charts
  • ♧ Trend trading
  • ♧ Risk Management
  • ♧ Structure levels
  • ♧ Forex indicators
  • ♧ Overall Technical Analysis
  • ♧ How to download and open Mt4 and Mt5 accounts with a reliable broker
  • ♧ what trading pairs fit your personality
  • ♧ And many more

FAQs

What is forex?

The term forex refers to the foreign exchange market, where traders buy and sell currency pairs in an attempt to make a profit.

How do i start trading?

You’ll need to find an online broker, open a trading account, and make your first deposit.

How do you i to trade forex?

The internet is filled with resources from articles and courses to videos, seminars, webinars, and more interactive options. Try starting with a google search for “beginner trading courses” and go from there.

Do you have to be rich to get started trading forex?

You can actually open a trading account with as little as $1 to $100 through some brokers. Just remember that the amount you make does depend on how much you invest.

Is trading really worth it?

If you’re willing to invest your time into trading, it can be a great way to earn extra income or even to support yourself or your family, especially in retirement.

Trading FOREX is highly speculative in nature, which can result in extremely volatile currency prices.You may suffer a total financial loss. Forex trading is fraught with danger and may not be appropriate for all investors. It is possible that you will lose some or all of your initial investment, so never put money at risk that you cannot afford to lose.There is no guarantee that any account will or is likely to generate earnings or losses. Past performance does not predict future outcomes. Individual results vary, and no guarantee is made that customers will or are likely to make profits or incur losses equivalent to those depicted.
